author: Anfloer
title: Absolutely stunning
text:
I realize i am very late in posting this review...but just had to. We stayed here for 5 nights last summer during our European tour and there is nothing I can fault the hotel with...other than perhaps some of the construction and beautifying that was going on at the time. However, no inconvenience at all.
We booked a terrace suite..the Eiffel tower view is to die for!
The suite is extremely generous in size for Paris, the terrace is large and the location of the hotel is great! It is located in an upscale arrondissement with easy access to transportation.
Breakfast in the courtyard in the morning was just fantastic.
Beds are sooo comfortable, the room was clean and the staff absolutely amazing.
We would definitely stay here again while in Paris!
